com.github.dkharrat.nexusdialog

Class FormElementController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.dkharrat.nexusdialog.FormElementController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FormSectionController, LabeledFieldController

    public abstract class FormElementController
extends java.lang.Object
    The base class for all form elements, such as text fields, buttons, sections, etc. Each FormElementController is referred by a name and has an associated FormModel.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected FormElementController(android.content.Context ctx, java.lang.String name)
      Constructs a new instance with the specified name.
